channel.title: Torify VM's with Whonix-Gateway, not working
channel.description: Hi, I'am trying to torify my vm's with whonix-gateway as stated [here](https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Other_Operating_Systems#Whonix-GNU.2FLinux-Workstation). I tried editing etc files from comand line and configure eh0 with the GUI. With the first method ping comand didnt resolve google.com and cant reach 8.8.8.8, with the second method ping resolves google.com but with 100% packet loss, same for 8.8.8.8 How do I fix this? also can the gateway stop tor and forward connections to clearnet so i can which tor on and off in my VM's? Thanks

item.title: Torify VM's with Whonix-Gateway, not working
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
You cannot use ping directly over Tor. ( https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Tor#UDP )

AlexTrusk:

can the gateway stop tor and forward connections to clearnet

Undocumented, unsupported. ( https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Unsupported )

AlexTrusk:

so i can which tor on and off in my VM’s?

switch
